comments_since_last_sample.body: Awesome cover!! His high notes!?Wow just wow! 💕💕💕
Thank you so much for all the good reviews of BTS

he always asks the fans to pay close attention to the lyrics of the songs he chooses to cover, falling in specific is really emotional for him to cover because he posted this on the 2nd anniversary of their last live concert, hes absolutely insane for this
He had me at “I’m in my bed”.
PLEASE WE STILL NEED A SOLAR POWER THE ALBUM REACTION
Jungkook's cover was so beautiful, I was crying the whole time, his voice is just so angelic and the emotions gave me goosebumps 😭😭
Thank you! Lisstin to still with you by Jungkook

Jk did so good and is soo beautiful!!! 

Personally I think this might be to ARMY. I think he misses performancing in front of a live audience. It’s been like 2 years since they have and it must be hard for him. Especially since his whole life since like 14-15 has been about performing. 

I think all the members are having a harder time then they are letting on…
This is a true tribute to a great song rather than a remix. You can tell JK loves this track. No need for changes, just great harmonies from JK himself to enhance it.🤟💜.
Jungkook’s voice is so powerful and full of emotions😍😍😍❤️❤️❤️ he has the voice of an angel 😭😭😭💜💜💜
I always love and enjoyed you’re reaction and how you break down to tiny details,thank you
I love jungkook covering English songs
Please react to gods menu by Stray kids

jungkook did so well ive been listening to mostly this cover ever since it dropped aaaaa 
that kitten is so cute :(((((
your kitty is so adorable omg
